modName: Unlimited Jewelry for Dawnguard and Dragonborn
summary: Allow you to wear as many amulets and rings as you like. Requires Skyrim 1.9.32.0 with Dawnguard and Dragonborn.
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700][size=5]General Description[/size][/color][/font][/b]
Inspired by mods that allow players to wear unlimited jewelry (especially this mod which only modifies the vanilla Skyrim without the two DLCs: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6703/?][b]Skyrim Unlimited Rings And Amulets [/b]by[b] glock9mm[/b][/url]), I created this mod with Creation Kit to make sure that happens too, with Dawnguard and Dragonborn installed.
Note that this mod already makes all jewelry in [b][color=#ff0000]BOTH[/color][/b] vanilla Skyrim [b][color=#ff0000]AND[/color][/b] the two DLCs unlimitedly wearable, so no need for the mod above, just install my mod and enjoy your life in Skyrim.

[font=Tahoma][color=#ff0000][size=5]WARNING:[/size] [/color][size=4]This mod may cause a great loss in having fun with the game since it is possible to have 100% resistance to magic/elements/disease/etc, zero shout CD and a great boost in blacksmith/alchemy/enchanting/etc skill by wearing enough enchanted jewelry. So it's kinda like cheating. Install it at your own risk.[/size][b] [color=#ff0000][size=4]YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED.[/size][/color][/b][/font]

-See my another mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58486/?]Unlimited Jewelry for Skyrim Redone[/url] if you have [color=#3c78d8][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286]T3nd0's Skyrim Redone[/url][/color] installed.

[b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][color=#ff7700]Requirements[/color][/size][/font][/b]
Requires Dawnguard and Dragonborn.
This means you have to load this mod after the DLCs.

[b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][color=#ff7700]Installation & Uninstallation[/color]
[/size][/font][/b]Just install & uninstall with NMM should do the trick.

[b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][color=#ff7700]Compatibility[/color]
[/size][/font][/b]Should be compatible with any other mod that does not alter vanilla jewelry properties. Otherwise just put the mod before mine. Note that new jewelries added by other mods will likely still work as unaltered.

[b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][color=#ff7700]Troubleshooting[/color]
[/size][/font][/b]No bugs detected so far. Notify me if you find any.
author: Zoraag

files.name: Unlimited Jewelry For Dawnguard and Dragonborn
